body.description: Biotene Fresh Mint Mouthwash is an ideal oral rinse for immediate relief of dry mouth symptoms when used as part of your daily oral health care routine. Formulated using a mouth moisturizing system, this dry mouth mouthwash provides up to four hours of soothing, lubricating relief from dry mouth symptoms, including bad breath, stickiness in the mouth, dryness in the mouth and chapped lips. This gentle sugar free and alcohol free mouthwash for dry mouth has a fresh mint flavor that freshens breath while working to keep your mouth clean and at a healthy, balanced pH. Simply rinse your mouth with 15 mL of Biotene mouthwash up to five times daily or as directed by a healthcare professional. Biotene oral mouthwash is formulated for adults and children 12 years and older. For long-lasting relief of dry mouth symptoms, choose Biotene, the Number 1 dry mouth brand trusted by dentists.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Moisturizes and soothes Biotene Fresh Mint Mouthwash contains a mouth-moisturizing system that is more effective than water alone to help provide soothing dry mouth relief. Works instantly The clinically-proven^ mouth moisturizing formula works instantly to effectively relieve dry mouth symptoms for up to four hours.* ^American Journal of Dentistry, February 2016 *as measured by a 28 day clinical study Helps reduce sleep interruption Biotene was shown to reduce sleep interruptions caused by dry mouth by 44.8%**. **improvement vs. water after 28 days use in a clinical study. How to use Rinse Biotene Mouthwash for 30 seconds as needed, up to five times per day for immediate relief from dry mouth symptoms that lasts up to 4 hours.* *as measured by a 28 day clinical study

1 in 4 people suffer from dry mouth Dry mouth is a common condition that affects one in four adults. Not only does it cause discomfort, but it can also lead to embarrassment, irritability and self-consciousness. It can also lead to a disturbance in sleep and a withdrawal from social situations. Click on the boxes to find out more about dry mouth problems. What is dry mouth? Dry mouth occurs when your mouth doesn't produce enough saliva to stay moist. It is a common condition, yet it is often not reported or properly managed. Common symptoms may include dryness in the mouth, bad breath, chapped lips or waking up at night feeling thirsty. Impact on oral health Dry mouth can lead to more than just discomfort - it can have long-term effects on your oral health and cause several problems, including up to a 3x greater risk of cavities, gingivitis, and mouth infections. Causes of dry mouth The primary cause of dry mouth is medication usage. There are more than 500 over-the-counter and prescription medicines that can cause dry mouth. Plus, the more medicines your take, the greater your chances are of developing dry mouth. 1 in 4 people suffer from dry mouth What is dry mouth? Impact on oral health Causes of dry mouth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Oral Rinse
reviews.reviewText: This is the best oral rinse I have come across in a long time. Great, pleasant taste and scent. No burn. No dry mouth; rather, it slickens the mouth. You will look forward to using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent oral moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I only buy this product here, as its very expensive in the drug store. It works so well. I'm on medications that cause chronic dry mouth, and after using this my tongue, gums, and teeth feel comfy and cozy! It's wonderful! It works great after flossing and brushing, and the moisturizing effect lasts for awhile. I feel good knowing that it's keeping my mouth tissues healthy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing Relief, but Watch Out for Consistency
reviews.reviewText: Dealing with dry mouth, whether it's caused by medications or stress, can be quite uncomfortable. Following my dentist's recommendation, I started using Biotene Oral Rinse Mouthwash for Dry Mouth. In this review, I'll discuss the notable pros and cons of this product based on my experience.Pros:Great Flavor: One of the standout features of Biotene Oral Rinse is its appealing flavor. Unlike some medicinal mouthwashes, this one offers a refreshing and pleasant taste. It makes the oral care routine more enjoyable, which is especially important for those dealing with chronic dry mouth.Effective Relief: Biotene Oral Rinse truly lives up to its promise of providing relief from dry mouth. I use it not only to combat the effects of medication-induced dryness but also during moments of nervousness before important presentations or meetings. It consistently delivers soothing moisture to my mouth, alleviating discomfort.Cons:Thickness Concern: One potential drawback of this product is its thickness. Unlike traditional mouthwash, Biotene Oral Rinse has a slightly thicker consistency. While this thickness contributes to its effectiveness in combating dry mouth, it may feel unusual or take some getting used to, particularly for those accustomed to standard mouthwash textures.In conclusion, Biotene Oral Rinse Mouthwash for Dry Mouth stands out as a reliable solution for combating dry mouth caused by medication or anxiety. Its great flavor makes it a pleasant addition to your oral care routine, and it consistently delivers much-needed relief. However, users should be aware of its thicker consistency, which may feel different compared to traditional mouthwash. Despite this minor concern, Biotene remains a valuable choice for maintaining oral comfort and moisture, especially for those dealing with persistent dry mouth issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the biotene mouthwash for a while, it really helps dry mouth. But Amazon needs to do better in shipping liquids, the box came all wet, found the biotene bottle was cracked on the bottom and leak out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ecellent minty taste and moistens my mouth
reviews.reviewText: Having a dry mouth from radiation treatments on both sides of my neck 2 1/2 years ago, I still use this product for my condition. The texture of the liquid can leave a stain on clothing if you let it sit on there. If this happens, use some rubbing alcohol to remove, then wash with water. Test fabric first to make sure it won't affect the fabric color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have suspected Sjogren's syndrome. Terrible dry mouth and throat. I have just used this rinse for the first time and I'm blown away by how comforting it feels. My tongue feels moisturized, not just wet. How can I better explain the feeling? I've been using Oralieve mouth spray for my dry mouth and it's okay but this oral rinse has not just staved off my dryness as the spray does, the rinse has left my tongue actually moisturized. If you have a dry mouth for any reason, this will give you relief, even if it's for a short while, well worth it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Deal with dry mouth in old age!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I've used this product for many years. I wasn't therefore surprised that my latest purchase met all my expectations!!!!
